manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: vote
  labels:
    app: vote
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: vote
      env: dev
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vote
        env: dev
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: vote
        image: dockersamples/examplevotingapp_vote:before
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: vote
violation_text: container "vote" has cpu request 0

manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: org2-install-k8s-builder
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      name: org2-install-k8s-builder
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: main
        image: ghcr.io/hyperledgendary/k8s-fabric-peer:${K8S_CHAINCODE_BUILDER_VERSION}
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - mkdir -p /mnt/fabric-org2/fabric/external_builders && cp -rv /opt/hyperledger/k8s_builder
          /mnt/fabric-org2/fabric/external_builders/
        volumeMounts:
        - name: fabric-org2-volume
          mountPath: /mnt/fabric-org2
      volumes:
      - name: fabric-org2-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: fabric-org2
violation_text: container "main" does not have a read-only root file system

manifest_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: csi-sfs-turbo-controller
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-sfs-turbo-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: csi-sfs-turbo-controller
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: csi-sfs-turbo-controller-sa
      containers:
      - name: csi-provisioner
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-provisioner:v1.4.0
        args:
        - -v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --enable-leader-election
        - --leader-election-type=leases
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - name: csi-attacher
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-attacher:v3.1.0
        args:
        - -v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - name: sfs-turbo-csi-plugin
        image: registry.eu-west-0.prod-cloud-ocb.orange-business.com/official/sfsturbo-csi-plugin:v1.8
        args:
        - --v=2
        - --logtostderr
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --nodeid=$(NODE_ID)
        - --cloud-config=$(CLOUD_CONFIG)
        ports:
        - containerPort: 28888
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
        env:
        - name: NODE_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix://csi/csi.sock
        - name: CLOUD_CONFIG
          value: /etc/sfs-turbo/cloud-config
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /etc/sfs-turbo/
          name: sfs-turbo-config
      - name: liveness-probe
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/livenessprobe:v1.1.0
        args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --connection-timeout=3s
        - --health-port=28888
        - --v=5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - name: socket-dir
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: sfs-turbo-config
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/sfs-turbo/
          type: Directory
violation_text: container "csi-attacher" does not have a read-only root file system
